publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3428 Mr Mike Rumbles: Standards Committee, Lobbying-That the Parliament notes the recommendations of the Standards Committee's 1st Report 2002, Lobbying, (SP Paper 507) and agrees to amend section 7 of the Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament as set out in Annex E of the report.

S1M-3428 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Lobbying—That the Parliament notes the recommendations of the Standards Committee’s 1st Report 2002, Lobbying, (SP Paper 507) and agrees to amend section 7 of the Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament as set out in Annex E of the report.
